links.title: Equifax Names Melissa Smith to Board of Directors
links.description: "We are thrilled to welcome Melissa as a new independent director on our board," said Mark W. Begor, CEO of Equifax. "Her strategic vision and broad-based executive leadership experience in the financial technology solutions industry will benefit Equifax as we continue investing in our cloud technology transformation to drive new product innovation and growth."
